Pre-Game Insights: India may experiment with new faces in the final T20I against Bangladesh
Ryan ten Doeschate stated that Harshit Rana, Tilak Verma, Ravi Bishnoi, and Jitesh Sharma could get a look in
Others: The match serves as a chance for misfiring openers Sanju Samson and Abhishek Sharma to come good
For Bangladesh, a disastrous tour nears the end. India has dominated proceedings in the two T20Is and the preceding Test series
